name: ArchiveOfOurOwn.org - Fonts & Tags [Ath]
description:
Various readability and usability improvements:

  • Customizable fonts — fonts can be set for various elements. By default, Segoe UI for UI, Verdana for text.
  • Customizable text width — width of work and article text can be changed. By default, 45em.
  • Tags colored by category — red warnings, cyanish relationships, yellowish characters, grey all others.
  • Expanded required tags' icons — text next to required tags' icons explaining what they mean.
  • Columns in tag index
  • Compatible with dark theme — to enable dark theme, install Dark style modifier.
